scripts.firebase:deploy:hosting: npm run build && firebase deploy --only hosting
scripts.deploy:staging: npm run build && firebase use staging && firebase deploy
scripts.predeploy: npm run test:coverage && npm run build:production
scripts.analyze: npm run build:production && npx serve -s build
scripts.test:property: firebase emulators:exec --only auth,firestore,storage "cross-env FAST_CHECK_NUM_RUNS=100 FAST_CHECK_TIME_LIMIT_MS=60000 REACT_APP_USE_FIREBASE_EMULATORS=true REACT_APP_USE_EMULATOR=true REACT_APP_FIREBASE_AUTH_EMULATOR_HOST=127.0.0.1:9099 REACT_APP_FIRESTORE_EMULATOR_HOST=127.0.0.1:8080 REACT_APP_FIREBASE_STORAGE_EMULATOR_HOST=127.0.0.1:9199 npm test -- --runInBand --testPathPattern=property\.test\.js --watchAll=false"
